adrFormatAddress: 324 East 86th St, New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text: Michael Chen is the worst broker to deal with, very stuckup attitude, wouldnt submit my offer, was super unresponsive. Botched a lease i wanted and had to sign elsewhere. Really must be a horrible leadership/training at this company.

text.text: Michael Chen is the worst broker to deal with, very stuckup attitude, wouldnt submit my offer, was super unresponsive. Botched a lease i wanted and had to sign elsewhere. Really must be a horrible leadership/training at this company.

originalText.text: Chip Marks was absolutely amazing to work with from a buyer's point of view. We didn't have an agent and happened to run into him at an open house we went to. After talking, my fiancee and I decided to use him as our agent. He was nothing, but cordial, helpful and extremely responsive. Chip was an absolutely HUGE asset throughout the our entire process from submitting an offer through our close. I would highly recommend Chip as a broker and will be sure to refer him to our friends.

text.text: Chip Marks was absolutely amazing to work with from a buyer's point of view. We didn't have an agent and happened to run into him at an open house we went to. originalText.text: Bobby Florian began helping me just a few weeks ago and showed me an amazing apartment - it had everything I wanted and he went to the management company and went ahead and asked a few questions for me which was great. I found him to be personable, trustworthy, patient and kind - a very hard find in a broker in this city. His emails and calls were quick to get back to me which I appreciated. I have already recomended him to friends and I hope to work with him again. He was spectacular.

originalText.text:
Josh Larris helped me find my perfect apartment during my lunch break.
I filed an inquiry online and Josh reached out immediately. He was professional, courteous, attentive, and helped me through the application process.
I am happily writing this review from my new home. Thanks Josh and Bond team!

originalText.text:
From start to finish, our experience with Kay Moon was incredibly pleasant and easy!  She was great to work with; she has great professionalism and skills. Only takes her about 3 weeks to find someone rent our apartment. We are so pleased we chose Kay Moon as our agent. We want to thank Kay Moon for all her hard work!

Edward
